mil.emp3.api.interfaces

Interface IEvent<T extends IEventEnum,TargetType>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - An enumeration class that implements IEventEnum.
    TargetType - Any java class.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CameraEvent, ContainerEvent, Event, FeatureDrawEvent, FeatureEditEvent, FeatureEvent, FeatureUserInteractionEvent, LookAtEvent, MapFeatureAddedEvent, MapFeatureRemovedEvent, MapFreehandEvent, MapInstanceFeatureAddedEvent, MapInstanceFeatureRemovedEvent, MapInstanceFeatureUserInteractionEvent, MapInstanceStateChangeEvent, MapInstanceUserInteractionEvent, MapInstanceViewChangeEvent, MapStateChangeEvent, MapUserInteractionEvent, MapViewChangeEvent, UserInteractionEvent, VisibilityEvent

    public interface IEvent<T extends IEventEnum,TargetType>
    This is a generic event structure that is presented to the application developer in the asynchronous event callback. It handles any mapping event in a consistent manner. These interfaces are designed to only allow specific map event types for the object they are applied. For instance, onEvent() will provide the mapping event on the form of a CameraEvent getEvents() when the event listener was added via addCameraListener().

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getEvent()
      This method retrieves the enumeration value that identifies the type of event.
      TargetType getTarget()
      This method return the object that the event occurred on.

        Returns:

      • getTarget

        TargetType getTarget()
        This method return the object that the event occurred on.
        Returns:
        An object derived from IGeoBase
